casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Twanprece N. IVEY. No. 458PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2006. Julie Ramseur Lewis, Assistant Public Defender, for Twanprece N. Ivey. Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of September 2006 by Attorney General to Suspend the Rules:

*574"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2006."
